statements: DELETE FROM recurring_payments WHERE id = 1 AND user_id = 100;
DELETE FROM recurring_payments WHERE amount > 500 AND frequency = 'Monthly';
DELETE FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_id = 100 AND customer_id = 500;
DELETE FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_id = 1001 AND customer_id = 5001;
DELETE FROM payment_methods WHERE customer_id = 5001 AND method_name = 'Credit Card';
DELETE FROM recurring_payments WHERE user_id = 100 AND payment_amount >= 1000;
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM payment_history);
DELETE FROM payment_methods WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 AND payment_frequency = 'monthly';
DELETE FROM payment_methods WHERE payment_type = 'credit' AND expiration_date < NOW();
DELETE FROM payments_history WHERE status = 'failed' AND failure_reason LIKE '%expired%';
